title: Print Labels for Lab Samples
description: A lab technician is preparing several new solutions and needs to print chemical-resistant labels with the material name, concentration, and expiration date.

tasks.description: Select a label template appropriate for small bottles.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent chooses the '1x2 inch Reagent Bottle' template.

tasks.description: Enter the information for the new solution and print 5 copies of the label.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the text and successfully sends the print job to the specialty label printer.
